revised_title: Isolation and Analysis of Toxins from Poison Plants of Western Australia
tldr: The authors investigate the chemical composition of poisonous plants in Western Australia, focusing on the isolation and analysis of toxins from the "York Road" poison plant, Gastrolobium calycinum. They identify and describe several toxic compounds, including Cygnine, a new alkaloid, and Gastrolobic Acid, and discuss their properties and effects.
